humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, one out of one sentinel lymph node is positive for metastatic carcinoma (1/1). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one out of four sentinel lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma (1/1), and there is no evidence of extranodal tumor extension. This corresponds to an N1 stage. The non-sentinel lymph nodes and other axillary contents are negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/22 and 0/16).
